original_title: الطنجاوي, أحلام و أحزان الطنجاوي الشاب العربي السالمي
overview: Full of revolutionary romanticism and also influenced by western culture in his final years at high school, Salmi declares his atheism to his father, but hides from everyone his love for his English teacher, a beautiful young woman from Paris.
title: Sorrows of a Young Tangerian
